title: Sam Bankman-Fried Wanted to Close Alameda in 2022, Unpublished Posts Show
description: He had hoped to continue Alameda as an investment firm and infrastructure developer, but claimed in the posts that Alameda wouldn’t actively trade.

title: SBF looks to Anthropic investment as Judge denies cross examination of Gary Wang
description:
In the ongoing criminal trial of Sam Bankman-Fried, attorneys for the FTX founder filed new letter motions related to the cross-examination of two key prosecution witnesses. In a letter Monday, Bankman-Fried’s lawyers asked Judge Lewis Kaplan for permission to question Gary Wang on the involvement of attorneys in structuring loans from Bankman-Fried’s trading firm Alameda […]

title: Nigerian Central Bank Refutes Media Reports Suggesting Its CBDC Poses a Threat to Financial Stability
description: The Nigerian central bank has disputed media reports suggesting its Sept. 11, 2023 document implies that its e-naira currency poses a threat to financial stability. title: Bitstamp set to halt operations in Canada by January 2024
description: In a surprising yet somewhat anticipated move, Bitstamp, a notable cryptocurrency exchange, has announced its departure from the Canadian market, effective January 8, 2024. This decision, influenced by a myriad of factors, including regulatory challenges, follows a trend of cryptocurrency exchanges reevaluating their presence in Canada. title: CHZ Price Plunge: What’s Behind Chiliz’s Sudden $3.5 Million Move?
description:

title: Arthur Hayes Issues BlackRock Warning, Says Multi-Trillion-Dollar Giant May Gain Power To Change Bitcoin (BTC)
